name: v2.9.1
body:
## What's changed
* Update web platform tests by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/704
* adding some support for lifetime bounds by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/705
* Avoid unnecessary string copy in set_scheme by @tniessen in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/706
* chore: extend sanitizers to the library  by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/707
* build(deps): bump actions/setup-node from 4.0.2 to 4.0.3 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/709
* build(deps): bump ossf/scorecard-action from 2.3.3 to 2.4.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/712
* build(deps): bump actions/setup-python from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/711
* build(deps): bump pytest from 8.2.2 to 8.3.2 in /tools/release by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/713
* build(deps): bump debian from `67f3931` to `5f7d566` by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/714
* build(deps): bump github/codeql-action from 3.25.11 to 3.25.15 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/710
* build(deps): bump actions/upload-artifact from 4.3.3 to 4.3.4 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/708
* Update web platform tests by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/715
* fix issue 716 by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/717

## New Contributors
* @tniessen made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/706

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v2.9.0...v2.9.1

name: v2.9.0
body:
## What's changed
* build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 4.1.4 to 4.1.6 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/686
* build(deps): bump jidicula/clang-format-action from 4.11.0 to 4.13.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/685
* build(deps): bump pytest from 8.2.0 to 8.2.1 in /tools/release by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/682
* build(deps): bump debian from `155280b` to `804194b` by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/681
* build(deps): bump ossf/scorecard-action from 2.3.1 to 2.3.3 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/684
* build(deps): bump github/codeql-action from 2.13.4 to 3.25.7 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/683
* Call ascii_has_upper_case from idna fuzzer by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/687
* Update web platform tests by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/688
* Add fuzzer for C wrapper by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/689
* perf: improve `ada::can_parse` by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/674
* Update web platform tests by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/698
* Fix ubuntu-22.04 workflow by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/691
* perf: optimize `ada::can_parse` more by @anonrig and @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/690
* build(deps): bump pytest from 8.2.1 to 8.2.2 in /tools/release by @CarlosEduR and @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/697
* build(deps): bump github/codeql-action from 3.25.7 to 3.25.11 by @CarlosEduR and @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/695
* build(deps): bump url from 2.5.0 to 2.5.2 in /benchmarks/competitors/servo-url by @CarlosEduR and @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/696
* build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 4.1.6 to 4.1.7 by @CarlosEduR and @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/693
* build(deps): bump actions/dependency-review-action from 4.3.2 to 4.3.3 by @CarlosEduR and @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/694
* build(deps): bump debian from `804194b` to `67f3931` by @CarlosEduR and @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/692
* perf: improve has_tabs_or_newline performance by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/670
* remove unused private function by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/700
* feat: add `url_search_params_reset` api by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/701

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v2.8.0...v2.9.0

name: v2.8.0
body:
## What's changed
* Update README.md 'C wrapper' section by @ayshvab in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/630
* add links to the spec by @rluvaton in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/631
* fix: update wpt-updater github workflow by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/633
* chore: update github checkout workflow by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/634
* prevent missing python warning when format feature not requested by @iamtimmy in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/636
* chore: update simdjson, fmt and cxxopts by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/635
* chore: simplify clang-format and update ruff by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/638
* Update web platform tests by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/637
* build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 4.1.2 to 4.1.4 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/648
* build(deps): bump actions/dependency-review-action from 4.2.5 to 4.3.2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/647
* build(deps): bump peaceiris/actions-gh-pages from 3.9.3 to 4.0.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/646
* build(deps): bump uraimo/run-on-arch-action from 2.7.1 to 2.7.2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/645
* build(deps): bump pytest from 8.1.1 to 8.2.0 in /tools/release by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/643
* build(deps): bump actions/upload-artifact from 4.3.1 to 4.3.3 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/644
* optimize has_tabs_or_newline for NEON by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/639
* build(deps): bump debian from `7802002` to `155280b` by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/641
* Under Windows, Rust detection is broken and leads to a CMake error. Disabling it. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/651
* Add workflow file to run arm-based testing with sanitizers by @anonrig and @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/649
* Add can_parse to benchmarks by @anonrig and @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/653
* Disable memory sanitizer from fuzz workflow by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/656
* separate fuzzers into different files by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/655
* fix: add git to aarch64 container in CI by @anonrig and @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/652
* Add dictionary to run with fuzzers by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/660
* Provide max_len to libFuzzer by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/661
* path setter bug by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/659
* Use correct fuzzer options by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/663
* Add validate() to parse.cc fuzzer by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/664
* improve parse fuzzer by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/665
* add memory sanitizer to cifuzz workflow by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/667
* fix: modernize python code by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/668
* fix: remove duplicate check on path_signature_table by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/669
* fix: simplify c api by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/671
* refactor: cleanup clang-tidy warnings by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/672
* refactor(ada_c/ada_free_owned_string): remove unused code by @pratikpc in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/673
* Add fuzzer for href setter and getter by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/657
* doc: make sure that it is clear that the strings are assumed to be valid UTF-8. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/675
* docs: add sponsorship links by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/676
* increase fuzzing coverage by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/677
* build: use fixed version for run-on-arch-action by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/678

## New Contributors
* @ayshvab made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/630
* @rluvaton made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/631
* @iamtimmy made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/636
* @CarlosEduR made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/649
* @pratikpc made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/673

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v2.7.8...v2.8.0

name: v2.7.8
body:
## What's changed
* build(deps): bump pytest from 8.0.0 to 8.0.2 in /tools/release by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/601

* replace .size() == 0 with empty() by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/612
* corrects a closing #endif comment by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/616
* adds curly brackets following if clauses making the code subjectively clearer by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/615
* improves slightly the style of url_search_params, makes to_string() c… by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/614
* simplifies some verbose lines of code. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/613
* Documenting hashing technique by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/618
* build(deps): bump actions/dependency-review-action from 4.1.3 to 4.2.5 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/620
* build(deps): bump pygithub from 2.2.0 to 2.3.0 in /tools/release by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/624
* build(deps): bump pytest from 8.0.2 to 8.1.1 in /tools/release by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/623
* build(deps): bump actions/setup-python from 5.0.0 to 5.1.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/621
* build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 4.1.1 to 4.1.2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/622
* build(deps): bump debian from `f80c454` to `7802002` by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/588
* doc: link to article by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/626
* fix: handle url search params encoding correctly by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/628

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v2.7.7...v2.7.8

name: v2.7.7
body:
## What's changed
* Verifying node issue 51619 by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/586
* exposing branch misses under macos by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/587
* add C++17 requirement directly in CMake by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/597
* Use docker so that you can clang-format using version 15 everywhere you are. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/585
* Marks as private several functions in our header files. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/600
* This makes ada's target compile options private under Windows. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/599
* build(deps): bump mymindstorm/setup-emsdk from 13 to 14 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/595
* build(deps): bump actions/upload-artifact from 4.0.0 to 4.3.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/594
* build(deps): bump uraimo/run-on-arch-action from 2.6.0 to 2.7.1 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/593
* build(deps): bump pytest from 7.4.4 to 8.0.0 in /tools/release by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/590
* build(deps): bump actions/setup-node from 4.0.1 to 4.0.2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/605
* build(deps): bump actions/upload-artifact from 4.3.0 to 4.3.1 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/604
* build(deps): bump mattnotmitt/doxygen-action from 452281fb0f5f8a3e8d3f7fa5359cb58f249dfa28 to e0c8cd4cd05e28b88e723b25b30188ecf2505b40 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/603
* build(deps): bump actions/dependency-review-action from 3.1.4 to 4.1.3 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/602
* build(deps): bump pygithub from 2.1.1 to 2.2.0 in /tools/release by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/591
* test: validate missing encoding in to_string by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/606

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v2.7.6...v2.7.7

name: v2.6.8
body:
## What's changed
* More thorough install check (Linux) by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/507

name: v2.5.0
body:
This version includes a recent change in URL standard and how `origin` getter works. The change is available on [whatwg-url](https://github.com/whatwg/url/pull/771) repository, as well as [Web Platform Tests](https://github.com/web-platform-tests/wpt/pull/40133) repository.

## What's changed
* docs: fix typos in code comment by @myd7349 in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/417
* Handle standard changes to origin getter by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/418

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v2.4.2...v2.5.0

name: v2.4.1
body:
## What's changed
* feat: add size parameters to c apis by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/380
* Command line improvements by @lemire and @Nick-Nuon in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/371
* Improved adaparse documentation + minor changes by @lemire and @Nick-Nuon in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/386
* Doc our perf by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/387
* build: improve ci-fuzz.yml by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/374
* fix bug with get_host() and get_hostname() when there is no host by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/390
* Fast fuzzing. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/391
* Update cli.md by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/394
* We must limit the input sizes in the fuzzer otherwise we might face time-outs by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/395
* Update build.sh by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/396
* fix issue 393 by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/397
* fix: update release script to consider only PRs with base.ref "main" by @miguelteixeiraa in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/398
* add ada::idna method to fuzzer by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/400
* build: move permissions to correct places by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/401
* One simple SIMD optimization by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/402
* Fix uninitialized buffer by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/403
* build: add codeql by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/405
* fix: handle `hostname` getter properly on CLI by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/404
* Documenting the performance benefits of Ada in Node.js by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/407

## New Contributors
* @Nick-Nuon made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/371

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v2.4.0...v2.4.1

name: v2.3.0
body:
## What's changed
* fix: ubsan signed overflow violations by @q66 in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/347
* Add undefined sanitizer to CI by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/348
* doc: add homebrew installation by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/346
* Fix lint_and_format_check.yml not running by @miguelteixeiraa in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/350
* Release process: Make actions send a PR instead of push into the main branch by @miguelteixeiraa in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/340
* This bumps IDNA with a recent fix to to_ascii. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/351
* fix: add missing type annotations by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/352
* fix: update workflows by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/353
* build: limit github workflow triggers by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/354

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v2.2.0...v2.3.0
